title: Three Witches Scene
content:
First Witch: When shall we three meet again?
Second Witch: In thunder, lightning, or in rain?
Third Witch: When the hurlyburly’s done,
              When the battle’s lost and won.
First Witch: That will be ere the set of sun.
All:       Fair is foul, and foul is fair:
              Hover through the fog and filthy air.

title: Inception
content: A masterful thriller by Christopher Nolan, 'Inception' layers dreams within dreams to explore the nature of reality. Its stunning visuals and Hans Zimmer’s score pull you into a labyrinth of intrigue—though its complexity demands full attention.

subject: Project Kickoff Meeting
body:
Hi Bob,

Can we schedule a kickoff call for the new API integration next Tuesday at 10 AM? Please let me know if that works or suggest another time.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Benefits Enrollment Deadline
body:
Dear all,

This is a reminder that open enrollment for 2025 benefits closes on July 15.
Please log in to the portal and submit your selections by end of day.

Thank you,
HR Team

title: To Be or Not to Be
content:
Hamlet: "To be, or not to be: that is the question:
Whether ’tis nobler in the mind to suffer
The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune,
Or to take arms against a sea of troubles
And by opposing end them."

title: The Godfather
content: An operatic crime saga that redefined noir cinema. Coppola’s direction and Puzo’s narrative craft a family epic drenched in power, loyalty, and moral ambiguity. Brando’s performance is iconic.

title: King Lear’s Storm
content:
Lear: "Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks! rage! blow!
You cataracts and hurricanoes, spout
Till you have drench’d our steeples, drown’d the cocks!
You sulph’rous and thought-executing fires,
Vaunt-couriers to oak-cleaving thunderbolts"

title: Parasite
content: Bong Joon-ho delivers a razor-sharp social satire with seamless tonal shifts. The Kim family’s schemes are both darkly comic and horrifying—each twist lands like a gut punch.

subject: Lunch Tomorrow?
body:
Hey Mark,

Are you free for lunch tomorrow at noon? There’s a new café on King Street I’d like to try.

Cheers,
Jane

subject: Server Maintenance Window
body:
Hello team,

Please note that we have scheduled a maintenance window this Saturday, July 12, from 02:00 to 04:00 AM EDT. During this time, all staging servers will be unavailable as we apply critical security patches.

Let me know if you foresee any issues.

Thanks,
Operations Team

title: Spirited Away
content: A visually enchanting voyage into a spirit world. Miyazaki’s animation is lush, and Chihiro’s coming-of-age journey resonates with warmth and wonder.

title: Balcony Scene
content:
Juliet: "O Romeo, Romeo! wherefore art thou Romeo?
Deny thy father and refuse thy name;
Or, if thou wilt not, be but sworn my love,
And I'll no longer be a Capulet."
Romeo: "[Aside] Shall I hear more, or shall I speak at this?"
